item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: muhammet@petekmedya.com
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: Home - Agency
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Creativity — meets
functionality.

Scroll to Discover Scroll to Discover Scroll to Discover Scroll to Discover Scroll to Discover Scroll to Discover Leksa a cretive full-stack agency based in London, UK where creativity meets functionality in web design, branding, and media services. Let’s innovate together.

Showreel – 2024

WHO WE ARE?

Crafting unique solutions with precision and passion.

Our Approach

At Leksa, we combine strategic insight with innovative design to deliver tailored solutions that perfectly align with your business objectives. Experience a personalized approach that sets your brand apart.

Harnessing the power of cutting-edge technology and creative excellence to drive tangible results and elevate your brand's market presence.

Learn more about us

Recent Works

Discover our recent works and see how we've transformed ideas into visually stunning and functional masterpieces.

View All View All View All View All View All View All
Los Coyotes
Life’s Stories
Percent
Vote#2024
UXUnleashed
Primo
Sauz Hothoney

OUR MISSION

Innonative Design
and Strategic Solutions

At Leksa, our mission is to empower your business through innovative design and strategic solutions. We strive to push the boundaries of creativity and functionality.

Culture & Team

Our Clients

We pride ourselves on forming enduring relationships with our clients by delivering exceptional services that exceed expectations.

Client #1 Client #2 Client #3

Become bigger
with our solutions.

Empowering your business through innonative design and strategic solutuions.

At Leksa, we offer a comprehensive suite of services designed to enhance your digital presence and strengthen your brand.

(01)

Web Design & Development

Create engaging, user-friendly websites that capture your brand’s essence. At Leksa, we focus on aesthetic appeal combined with functional design to ensure your website not only looks great but performs exceptionally across all devices.

(02)

Brand Identity

Establish a powerful brand identity that resonates with your target audience. Our comprehensive branding services include logo design, color scheme development, and the creation of branding guidelines to ensure consistency across all your marketing materials.

(03)

Social Media Management

Expand your online presence and engage effectively with your audience. We offer tailored social media strategies, content creation, and management services designed to grow your following and enhance your brand's influence on social media platforms.

(04)

Photography

Capture the perfect images to tell your brand's story. Our professional photography services range from product shots and corporate portraits to event photography and editorial shoots, all tailored to meet your specific needs.

(05)

Video Production

From conceptualization to final edit, our video production services are designed to produce compelling visual content that engages and inspires your audience. Whether it’s promotional videos, tutorials, or corporate documentaries, we bring your stories to life with stunning visuals and sound.

Client Success
Stories

Discover firsthand accounts of how our services have transformed businesses. Read through our testimonials to see the impact of our creativity and expertise.

item.title: Home - Showcase Rotate
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: All Projects All Projects Percent UI/UX Design Redefining financial literacy with accessible tools and expert guidance, Percent empowers individuals to navigate investments, savings, and wealth management with confidence and clarity. Austeria Branding Curating moments of refined elegance and timeless charm, Austeria invites you to indulge in a world where sophistication meets hospitality, creating unforgettable experiences. Life’s Stories Photography Capturing the essence of every moment through personalized storytelling, Life's Stories offers a unique platform to immortalize memories and celebrate life's journey. Los Coyotes Branding Embark on a culinary journey inspired by the vibrant flavors and rich traditions of Mexican cuisine, where every dish tells a story of authenticity and passion. Style Scape Web Design Unveiling creativity with curated visuals and interactive features, redefining presentation aesthetics and enhancing audience engagement for memorable experiences. Taller Alvarado UI/UX Design Crafting timeless masterpieces through artisanal expertise and dedication, merging tradition with innovation to redefine craftsmanship in every creation. Sauz Hothoney Photography Infusing culinary experiences with a tantalizing blend of spicy and sweet flavors, elevating dishes and beverages with a deliciously distinctive twist. Vote#2024 Branding Empowering citizens with information, engagement, and participation tools to shape the future, fostering a democratic society driven by informed decisions and active citizenship. Immersive Realities Branding Pioneering a new era of experiential retail with cutting-edge technology, interactive environments, and personalized experiences, transforming the way we shop and engage with brands. UXUnleashed Web Design Unleashing the power of user experience through cutting-edge design and seamless functionality, transforming interactions and driving engagement to new heights Scroll Explore

item.title: Home - Fullscreen Cards
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
(2023 — 2024)

View All Projects View All Projects View All Projects View All Projects View All Projects View All Projects Creative Agency
Based in London,UK

Los Coyotes Branding Pastel Ladies Web Design Synchronicity Video Life’s Stories Photography Primo Branding Taller Alvarado UI/UX Design Vote#2024 Branding Discover the heart and soul of
Leksa

Innovating Today, Defining Tomorrow:
Shaping the Future of Digital Excellence

WHO WE ARE

Crafting unique solutions with precision and passion.

Our Approach

At Leksa, we combine strategic insight with innovative design to deliver tailored solutions that perfectly align with your business objectives. Experience a personalized approach that sets your brand apart.

Harnessing the power of cutting-edge technology and creative excellence to drive tangible results and elevate your brand's market presence.

Learn more about us

Our Clients

We pride ourselves on forming enduring relationships with our clients by delivering exceptional services that exceed expectations.

Client #1 Client #2 Client #3

Become bigger
with our solutions.

Empowering your business through innonative design and strategic solutuions.

At Leksa, we offer a comprehensive suite of services designed to enhance your digital presence and strengthen your brand.

(01)

Web Design & Development

Create engaging, user-friendly websites that capture your brand’s essence. At Leksa, we focus on aesthetic appeal combined with functional design to ensure your website not only looks great but performs exceptionally across all devices.

(02)

Brand Identity

Establish a powerful brand identity that resonates with your target audience. Our comprehensive branding services include logo design, color scheme development, and the creation of branding guidelines to ensure consistency across all your marketing materials.

(03)

Social Media Management

Expand your online presence and engage effectively with your audience. We offer tailored social media strategies, content creation, and management services designed to grow your following and enhance your brand's influence on social media platforms.

(04)

Photography

Capture the perfect images to tell your brand's story. Our professional photography services range from product shots and corporate portraits to event photography and editorial shoots, all tailored to meet your specific needs.

(05)

Video Production

From conceptualization to final edit, our video production services are designed to produce compelling visual content that engages and inspires your audience. Whether it’s promotional videos, tutorials, or corporate documentaries, we bring your stories to life with stunning visuals and sound.

LET'S MEET!

Let's create wonderful
things together!

Our journey has been marked by countless successful projects that not only achieved but surpassed our clients' goals, reinforcing their trust in us as a leading innovator in the digital landscape.

Start A Project Start A Project Start A Project Start A Project Start A Project Start A Project

General May 8, 2024May 8, 2024
The Ultimate Guide to Crafting Compelling Social Media Content

In today’s digital age, the visibility of your website on search engines can make or break your business. Improving your website’s SEO is essential for increasing traffic, generating leads, and ultimately driving sales. Here is a practical, step-by-step guide to enhance your SEO ranking within just 30 days. Day 1-7: Keyword Research and Strategy Development Day 1: Identify Your Target Audience Day 1: Identify Your Target Audience Before diving into SEO, it’s crucial to understand who your target audience is. What are their needs, where do they spend their time online, and what search terms might they be using? This…

What are their needs, where do they spend their time online, and what search terms might they be using? This…

item.title: Portfolio - Grid
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
OUR WORK

Explore our curated collection of projects where creativity and functionality converge to deliver exceptional results.

All Projects
  • All Projects
  • UI/UX Design
  • Branding
  • Photography
  • Video
  • Web Design
Grid List
Percent UI/UX Design Redefining financial literacy with accessible tools and expert guidance, Percent empowers individuals to navigate investments, savings, and wealth management with confidence and clarity. NovaPulse 2018
Life’s Stories Photography Capturing the essence of every moment through personalized storytelling, Life's Stories offers a unique platform to immortalize memories and celebrate life's journey. Swiftaler 2021
Austeria Branding Curating moments of refined elegance and timeless charm, Austeria invites you to indulge in a world where sophistication meets hospitality, creating unforgettable experiences. CelestialWave 2019
Pastel Ladies Web Design Harnessing the power of cutting-edge technology and creative excellence to drive tangible results and elevate your brand's market presence. Wedns 2024
Los Coyotes Branding Embark on a culinary journey inspired by the vibrant flavors and rich traditions of Mexican cuisine, where every dish tells a story of authenticity and passion. Equinox Beam 2022
Style Scape Web Design Unveiling creativity with curated visuals and interactive features, redefining presentation aesthetics and enhancing audience engagement for memorable experiences. Spectrum 2023
Primo Branding Exemplifying excellence in every detail, Primo offers premium quality products and services that elevate lifestyles and exceed expectations. I.D. Building 2022
Taller Alvarado UI/UX Design Crafting timeless masterpieces through artisanal expertise and dedication, merging tradition with innovation to redefine craftsmanship in every creation. SparkZenith 2022

item.title: Portfolio - List
item.dc:creator: enes
item.content:encoded:
OUR WORK

Explore our curated collection of projects where creativity and functionality converge to deliver exceptional results.

All Projects
  • All Projects
  • UI/UX Design
  • Branding
  • Photography
  • Video
  • Web Design
Grid List
Percent UI/UX Design Redefining financial literacy with accessible tools and expert guidance, Percent empowers individuals to navigate investments, savings, and wealth management with confidence and clarity. NovaPulse 2018
Life’s Stories Photography Capturing the essence of every moment through personalized storytelling, Life's Stories offers a unique platform to immortalize memories and celebrate life's journey. Swiftaler 2021
Austeria Branding Curating moments of refined elegance and timeless charm, Austeria invites you to indulge in a world where sophistication meets hospitality, creating unforgettable experiences. CelestialWave 2019
Pastel Ladies Web Design Harnessing the power of cutting-edge technology and creative excellence to drive tangible results and elevate your brand's market presence. Wedns 2024
Los Coyotes Branding Embark on a culinary journey inspired by the vibrant flavors and rich traditions of Mexican cuisine, where every dish tells a story of authenticity and passion. Equinox Beam 2022
Style Scape Web Design Unveiling creativity with curated visuals and interactive features, redefining presentation aesthetics and enhancing audience engagement for memorable experiences. Spectrum 2023
